comments.body: Not supported to start PS within PS.  Consider a better error message.

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
From @mirichmo 

This is a bug that blocks the primary PowerShell Core startup scenario. A workaround will be necessary to modify the registration script so that it will work when run from the inbox version of PowerShell. The scenario becomes:
A.  User connects to inbox ps on Nano server.
B.  User unpacks PowerShell
C.  User runs the PowerShell registration script and passes the PowerShell Core PSHOME as an argument
D.  User reconnects to nano server, but specifies the new PowerShell Core remoting endpoint.

#1690 to track this update.
